amendment.description: To prohibit funds appropriated under this Act from being used to remove, deport, or detain an alien spouse or child of an individual who died as a result of a September 11, 2001 terrorist attack, unless certain circumstances exist.

vote.text: Amendment SA 233 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 233 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S1406-1408; text: CR S1407) To prohibit funds appropriated under this Act from being used to remove, deport, or detain an alien spouse or child of an individual who died as a result of a September 11, 2001 terrorist attack, unless certain circumstances exist.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 233 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 233 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Corzine.
